message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with the problem of scheduling sensors in a resource-constrained linear dynamical system, which involves optimization and algorithm design. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory). The problem formulation and analysis involve concepts from control theory and optimization, which suggests the category cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper proposes a randomized algorithm, which falls under the category cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves the analysis of a set function, which is related to the category cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper involves the analysis of the mean square error of an estimator, which is related to the category cs.MA (Machine Learning).
